overview: The tawdry story continues with the 34th installment of Lesbian Triangles as women seduce other women, make love to them, and leave them for others! In this very special pantyhose-laden episode, watch as star-crossed lovers Vanessa Veracruz and Penny Pax collide in an explosion of sapphic passion that will leave you hungry for more! Luckily for you, there's three more incredible scenes!
title: Lesbian Triangles 34
